title: Full Show (Jimmy Butler & The Heat win Game 1, Mavs/Warriors predictions, Should the Magic take Chet Holmgren with the #1 pick?)
description:
00:00 Is Jimmy Butler the best player remaining in the playoffs?
22:35 LeBron on Luka
39:44 Who will win Game 1: Mavs or Warriors?
53:42 Butler’s post-game comments
1:06:33 Does KD need to win another championship for his legacy?
1:02:03 Did Butler prove his two-way dominance last night?
1:29:25 Western Conference Finals preview
1:38:28 Micah Parsons
1:47:45 Who should the Magic take with the first pick in the 2022 NBA Draft?
1:53:30 Mavs/Warriors Game 1
